summary.aiHeadline: US Farmers Adapt with Agritourism Amid Economic Challenges
summary.aiBlurb: As traditional farming faces economic pressures, US farmers are increasingly turning to agritourism, such as Airbnb rentals and corn mazes, to sustain their livelihoods. Meanwhile, legislative efforts focus on modernizing farm safety nets to support the agricultural sector.
